metadata.title: CVE-2024-56757 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: btusb: mediatek: add intf release flow when usb disconnectMediaTek claim an special usb intr interface for ISO data transmission.The interface need to be released before unregistering hci device whenusb disconnect. Removing BT usb dongle without properly releasing theinterface may cause Kernel panic while unregister hci device.
